Welcome to the Case Studies Page for the UFS Weather Model¶

This documentation provides resources for representative case studies in the Unified Forecast System (UFS) Weather model using UFS Medium-Range Weather Application (for community) and NOAA Environmental Modeling Center’s Global Workflow (for developers).

Medium-Range Weather (MRW) App

Global Workflow

GitHub

ufs-community/ufs-mrweather-app

Public Release

v1.0

Compsets

GFSv16beta, GFSv15p2

GitHub

NOAA-EMC/global-workflow

Branch

feature/gfs16b

ufs-weather-model

GFS.v16.0.10

Notable Links¶

  • Key foci for UFS of Medium-Range/Subseasonal-to-Seasonal scale research and development (from UFS-R2O Roject)

  • Developmental Testbed Center (DTC)

  • Unified Forecast System (UFS)

  • The UFS Medium-Range Weather App Users Guide

  • NOAA Environmental Modeling Center (EMC) global-workflow GitHub Wiki page
